subject: The Skinny: Friday April 13, 2007
body:

From Imus To Iraq
A busy news week draws to an end with 
      three stories competing for space on the front pages: the suicide 
      bomb attack on the Iraqi parliament, the growing controversy over 
      those "missing" White House e-mails, and the apparent end of the 
      Don Imus imbroglio.
Joel Roberts has the highlights of 
      the day's headlines.  More...

Joel Robertstheskinny@cbs.com
